"Couldn't get info. Try again in 3-5 days."

"First activation is registered when a device connects to the network (including but not limited to Wi-Fi and mobile networks) for the first time. It normally takes a while to register first activation, so it's better to wait for 3-5 days after connecting to the network before checking activation status.

Device activation is the main factor in determining the validity period of our extended warranty. Check our Return, Exchange, and Repair Policy for more details.

Feel free to call our customer support hotline if you have any questions: 400-100-5678."

"First activation is registered when a device connects to the network (including but not limited to WLAN and mobile networks) for the first time. Device activation is the main factor in determining the validity period of our extended warranty. Check our Return, Exchange, and Repair Policy for more details.

Feel free to call our customer support hotline if you have any questions: 400-100-5678."

Welcome to Xiaomi Cloud services! You can use Xiaomi Cloud to sync your messages, call history, contacts, notes, Browser settings, songs, photos and videos, WLAN settings, recordings, Home screen layout, apps, calendar events, Blocklist items, and App vault across all connected devices.

Welcome to Xiaomi Cloud services! You can use Xiaomi Cloud to sync your messages, call history, contacts, notes, Browser settings, songs, photos and videos, WLAN settings, recordings, Home screen layout, apps, calendar events, Blocklist items, and App vault across all connected devices.

"Barka da zuwa sabis Cloud na Xiaomi! Kuna iya amfani da Cloud na Xiaomi don daidaita saƙonninku, lambobin sadarwa, bayanan kula, saitunan bincike, hotuna da bidiyo, rakodi, abubuwan kalanda, da abubuwan Blocklist a cikin duk na'urorin da aka haɗa."

"Barka da zuwa Sabisin Cloud na xiaomi! Kana iya amfani da Cloud na Xiaomi don ka daidaita sakonnin ka, tarihin kira, lambobi, da rubutu, saittunan Burauza, wakoki, hotuna da bidiyoyi, saittunan Wi-Fi, nadawa, Nunawar Allon farko, manhaja, aukuwa na kalanda, abubuwanda aka toshe da Ma'ajiyar manhaja da aka hada a dukan na'urori."

"Welcome to Xiaomi Cloud services! You can use Xiaomi Cloud to sync your messages, call history, contacts, notes, Browser settings, songs, photos and videos, Wi-Fi settings, recordings, Home screen layout, apps, calendar events, Blocklist items, and App vault across all connected devices. Access the items you sync from any browser at i.mi.com.

To activate these services, %1$d domestic paid SMS will be sent. When you switch SIM cards, %1$d domestic paid SMS will be sent automatically for reactivation.
All the SMS fees generated by the aforementioned actions will be collected by your carrier. Xiaomi won't charge you for these messages.

We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and privacy policies.
To be able to work normally, these services need to connect to the internet and require the following permissions in order to collect your personal information:
• Calendar:
For syncing events
• Accessing SMS:
For syncing messages
• Accessing MMS:
For syncing messages
• Accessing contacts:
For syncing contacts
• Editing contacts:
For syncing contacts
• Storage:
For saving items on your device (e.g. images, videos, songs)
If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use these services. You can choose to uninstall this app, sign out, or restrict permissions in the Settings in such cases.
Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using our services.
"

"Welcome to Xiaomi Cloud services! You can use Xiaomi Cloud to sync your messages, call history, contacts, notes, Browser settings, songs, photos and videos, Wi-Fi settings, recordings, Home screen layout, apps, calendar events, Blocklist items, and App vault across all connected devices. Access the items you sync from any browser at i.mi.com.

To activate these services, %1$d domestic paid SMS will be sent. When you switch SIM cards, %1$d domestic paid SMS will be sent automatically for reactivation.
All the SMS fees generated by the aforementioned actions will be collected by your carrier. Xiaomi won't charge you for these messages.

We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and privacy policies.
To be able to work normally, these services need to connect to the internet and require the following permissions in order to collect your personal information:
• Calendar:
For syncing events
• Accessing SMS:
For syncing messages
• Accessing MMS:
For syncing messages
• Accessing contacts:
For syncing contacts
• Editing contacts:
For syncing contacts
• Storage:
For saving items on your device (e.g. images, videos, songs)
If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use these services. You can choose to uninstall this app, sign out, or restrict permissions in the Settings in such cases.
Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using our services.
"

Cloud na Xiaomi yana buƙatar haɗi zuwa intanet don aiki koyaushe. Daidaita aiki da bayanai na iya buƙatar amfani da bayanan wayar hannu da kunna Wi-Fi. Karanta ka yarda da Yarjejeniyar Mai amfani da Sharuddan Bayanai kafin amfani da sabisin Cloud na Xiaomi.

"Barka da zuwa sabis Cloud na Xiaomi! Kuna iya amfani da Cloud na Xiaomi don daidaita saƙonninku,lambobi, rubutu, saittunan burauza, hotuna da bidiyo, rakodi, abubuwan kalanda, da abubuwan Jerin da aka toshe a cikin duk na'urorin da aka haɗa. Kuna iya zuwa i.mi.com don isowa ga abubuwa da aka daidaita daga dukan wani burauza

Don aiwatar da waɗannan ayyukan, %1$d za'a aika sakon biya na kasa. Idan kuka canza katunan SIM, %1$d sakon biya na kasa zai shigo da kansa don sake aiwatarwa.
Duk kuɗin SMS da aka samar ta abubuwan da aka ambata za a tattara su daga kamfanin sadarawar ku. Xiaomi ba za ta caje ku ba saboda waɗannan saƙonnin.

Za mu kare bayananka na sirri da dokokin da suka dace, ka'idoji, da sharuddan bayanai.
Don iya yin aiki daidai, Gano na'urar na buƙatar haɗa da intanit kuma na buƙatar wadannan izini don tattara bayanan ka na sirri:
• Kalanda:
Na daidaita aukuwa
• Isowa ga SMS:
Na daidaita sakonni
• Isowa ga lambobi:
Na daidaita lambobi
• Gyara lambobi:
Na daidaita lambobi
• Ma'aji:
Don adana abubuwa a kan na'urarka (misali hotuna, bidiyoyi)
Idan ba ka yarda a ba da irin wannan izini ko raba da loda bayananka na sirri ba, ba za ka iya amfani da waɗannan ayyukan ba. Kuna iya zaɓar cire wannan manhajar, fita, ko ƙuntata izini a cikin Saituna a cikin irin waɗannan lokuta.
Karanta kuma ka amince da Yarjejjeniyar mai Amfanin mu da Sharuddan Bayanan mu kafin amfani da sabisin mu.
"

"Ma'ajin cloud ya cika. Ba'a iya daida hotuna, rubutu, da wasu abubuwa."
Ya kasa hadawa da hanyar sadarwa
Ya kara wani gajeren hanya na Allon farko ma Cloud na Xiaomi?
Daidaitawa da Cloud na Xiaomi na kashe
Ka na bukatar ka shiga kuma
"Wasu abubuwa %s ba su daidaita ba. Za su saura a cikin na'urar ka kuma baza su share ba."
Dukan abubuwa masu muhimmanci a wuri daya
